synopsis.text: Earth's population has been turned to stone for thousands of years, but one brilliant young scientist, Senku Ishigami, has awakened to find himself in a world devoid of civilization. With his passion for science and his childhood friend Taiju by his side, Senku sets out to rebuild society from the ground up. In order to embark on a global voyage to uncover the truth behind the petrification phenomenon, Senku and his team must construct a ship and find a skilled sailor to navigate the open seas. Their search leads them to Ryusui Nanami, a talented but arrogant sailor who demands wealth and resources in exchange for his services. To meet Ryusui's demands and build their ship, the team must use their scientific know-how to recreate essential tools and technology, from paper currency to hot air balloons. As they work towards their goal, Senku and his friends face challenges and setbacks, but their determination to restore humanity and explore the world never wavers. Join them on their exciting journey in "Dr. Stone," the thrilling anime that explores the power of science and the human spirit.
